price: 21. Of hebben Wij hen een Boek hiervoor gegeven waaraan zij zich vasthouden?
arabic: أَمۡ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُمۡ كِتَٰبٗا مِّن قَبۡلِهِۦ فَهُم بِهِۦ مُسۡتَمۡسِكُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: am ātaynāhum kitāban min qablihi fahum bihi mus'tamsikūna
